show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #24 Jason Meadows "Succession is like Drought"
subtitle: #24 Jason Meadows "Succession is like Drought"
summary:
Jason Meadows from the Ag State of Mind podcast joins us this week to share what he's learned in nearly 100 episodes of podcasting.

https://agstateofmind.com/
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/vets-in-ag-podcast/id1549873202
